website_summaries.verdict: A fun and well-made design perfect for pool parties.
pros: Customers like the cute design and stability of this option in floating pool bars
Most felt it was versatile, strong, and well-balanced
It also earns points for being strong
cons: A few felt it lost air too quickly and some commented the soda can holders could be a bit difficult to clean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this floating bar. Perfect floater for my chihuahua as well!
customer_reviews.author: Christina sun

customer_reviews.title: Strong and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for some drinks in the pool... or for your drunk husband to lay through as he swims around. So pretty hardy.
customer_reviews.author: Bloveshia

customer_reviews.title: “Pass me a beer”
customer_reviews.text: A great idea with excellent execution. Sturdy material, easy to inflate / deflate, and looks awesome. Pro tip: put a medical-grade icepack in the button before adding ice to keep the beers cold for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Not just for the pool!
customer_reviews.text: We used this for an ice cream social at my work. It was a big hit and was perfect for holding toppings and ice cream sandwiches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this inflatable, it’s easy to inflate, the material is great and it’s so pretty! I used it on a trip to a lake and we used it every day to hold the drinks and snacks. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: It's really high quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised how high quality the material is and sturdy and its lasted a long time and definitely will last a lot more. The colors are beatiful on the rainbow and does the job really well. Very happy with the product and was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Fun pool drink holder
customer_reviews.text: Great drink holder for the pool. Very stable and holds cups, cans and snacks. Plus it is just fun to see the floating rainbow and cloud.
customer_reviews.author: Caligrrl

customer_reviews.title: Cute & festive.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, haven't tried it with food. Looks like it works with cans. Will update after pool party with pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Peace

customer_reviews.title: What can I say... we love this thing... ; )
customer_reviews.text: We really love this thing, we used every weekend on our pool to hold our bottles, cups, Ice, etc... even our chihuahuas use it as a raft.... we have so much fun with this floaty.... hurry get one, you won't regret it...
customer_reviews.author: Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This was great at my pool party. I was able to put a while fruit platter on it! Well worth the money! Will use it again for everything!!
customer_reviews.author: joy

customer_reviews.title: Toddler approved
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved it even though it’s intended for drinks!
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: What a great purchase! Inflated easily with electric pump and is very sturdy and cute. When we get around to it’s intended use I’m sure it will be just as sturdy but for now it is holding a 12 pound poodle just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Fancy Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Surprise, Surprise 😁
customer_reviews.text: This is not only cute as can be, but sturdy. My husband blew up with a compressor and we had a ceramic cheese plate, crackers, fruit in the middle of the float and a bottle of beer. Didn’t tip or tilt. We have an infinity edge pool so did keep an eye that it didn’t get too close to the edge. A great gift for the friends that were here and loved it,
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Love this as a lap desk in pool
customer_reviews.text: I love this float. Had mine a year. Used it daily. It got busted. Just ordered two more. I use it as a lap desk in the pool. Can sit my ipad in the large Middle section and the temp of the water cools the iPad without it getting wet. (It’s in a waterproof case too don’t worry ha ha). But this float rocks. Love the rainbow and the utility of it. It held up in TX 105 temp for over a year so totally worth the price. Highly recommend for anyone who sits in the pool to read and wand something to rest your arms on, hold your tablet, drink. Etc. love it so much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this float. It holds air well- no leaks. And this thing is so much bigger than I expected. I love it! It's so cute. My cat even likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Christa Hallo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We took this for our trip to DR we had a private pool and wanted to get fancy. This held up well and also I did like the instructions suggested and used a blow dryer to blow it up. I took a paper made a funnel and had the blowdryer blow down and it blew it up fast. We only had to blow it up once and it lasted the whole trip.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana Slade

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and stayed inflated ! Used as a candy bar!
customer_reviews.author: LaDeeDa

customer_reviews.title: Works Well!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and works really well to hold a bunch of ice and drinks while you’re floating around in the pool. It even stays afloat with people and dogs jumping in and out of the pool. Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Gets lots of laughs until they realize how awesome it is.
customer_reviews.text: This is so nice to have in our little pool. Its like having a little table. I put my phone (waterproof), glasses, anything really inside and use the pockets to hold my beer. We tried using the center for ice like the picture but it just melts too fast. I'd rather have super cold beer and just hope out to get another one. But the little thing is still awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase ! It floats evenly in the water and holds not only 12 oz cans but 24 oz ones haha ! I get a lot of “where did u buy questions?’ So ofcourse I referred to amazon
customer_reviews.author: Audrey R. Guajardo

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to use this in water yet but I did inflate it and it did hold the air. It’s a good size for my purposes. So far so good. UPDATE: we took this to our timeshare and used it in the pool. It worked great. We did line the center with a plastic bad to prevent a sharp edge of ice from piercing the plastic, though I don’t know if that was necessary. The cup holders fit can beverages or plastic bottles perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: great for the grown ups!
customer_reviews.text: I not only use this for beverages, I put my cell phone in a plastic bag, put it in the center section, tie the rainbow to my float, and listen to books on audible while i float. Going to try it with my yarn next! knitting, sipping wine, and listening to a good book while floating...happy grandma!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Fun and well made
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old daughter thinks she needs to eat and drink in the pool because that would be ‘so cool’ so we bought this and it really is cool and works well It’s very sturdy and stays upright
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Small leak in seam
customer_reviews.text: Mine must have had a small hole in a seam. I inflated it, put it in the pool with other floats. About 30 mins later it was filled with water inside the float. So I really don't know if it actually will hold anything. I would send it back, but like I said, it's filled with water I can't get out.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha C Stewart

customer_reviews.title: It floats great and holds drinks
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift. It floats great and holds drinks. We haven’t used it to it’s full capacity but seems to made well and should work out well. The only downfall is children seem to think it is a floaty or a toy to dive through.
customer_reviews.author: Denise S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Functional
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I went with this one because it not only will hold multiple drinks it has a space in the middle for larger things. You can fill it with ice and drinks or snacks. You also won’t have to worry about it tipping over even when the drink spots are filled but the “back” isn’t. It’s a fun addition to our pool.
customer_reviews.author: KgH

customer_reviews.title: Great pool accessory!
customer_reviews.text: Even though my boyfriend thinks it’s silly, I think it’s perfect for holding our drinks, sunscreen & our waterproof phones. It stays balanced & hasn’t tipped over.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren E

customer_reviews.title: A tad overpriced
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute. It’s functional. It’s super easy to inflate. But I don’t see it lasting very long. The seams are really sharp and jagged.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: A way better choice than those individual drink holders
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our pool party weekend in Palm Springs. A way better choice than those individual drink holders! Loads of fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A. Sepanski

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this! In the summer it’s perfect for the lake so you don’t have to keep going up and down from the boat! Happy I purchased! Can’t wait to use again in a few months. Would be great for pools too.
customer_reviews.author: MK.25

customer_reviews.title: Cute inflatable snack bar
customer_reviews.text: Fun for the kids. They don’t have to get out of the water to get drinks and snacks. Heavy plastic. Hope it last the summer season. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Estella Luna

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for friends to use during our Palm Springs trip. I have used it many times before in Tahoe, friends pools and even hiking to a few swimming holes. This was sturdy enough for drinks and holding random things in the middle, but what really convinced me this can carry weight was when we were hiking. I needed to cross a watering hole but had a pack with snacks and clothes in it. I inflated this to hold it all as I swim across and it held up AND kept my stuff dry!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We totally luv this in our pool! It’s the perfect size and sturdy enough to hang onto as a floatie too lol perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for end of season pool party
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item for friends of ours as a gift to use during our end of season pool party. It was the perfect gift we had been looking for, it was exactly as pictured and kept our drinks cold while we hung out in the pool. Thanks so much for a great additional to our big summer blowout!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Conheeney

customer_reviews.title: Love it! A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our pool party (ONLY 10ppl due to Covid) but it was a hit! It's sooo cute! I'm going to buy another one 💞
customer_reviews.author: NkLei

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the pool. It is not insulated so don't expect your drinks to stay cool; however, it does keep your drinks handy. It has last several months now and was easy to inflate.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I thought for sure this would be a one hit wonder as kids pop everything but it’s going strong after 3 steady weeks of almost everyday in the pool. Perfect to float water and grapes around while we cool off!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Not only is it super cute but it works perfect! I love that it has multiple cup holders and a small section you can put ice and have extra drinks there too.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica a phipps

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but not super practical
customer_reviews.text: Looked cute floating in the pool but doesn't really hold enough ice to keep drinks cool in a hot summer pool - we used the cup holders and it was cute in photos.
customer_reviews.author: MY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pool Beverage Holder!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect little pool beverage holder. It's a great bang for your buck pool purchase, we literally use it everyday. It also makes a great storage place for goggles and swim toys when the ice chest area is empty. I would definitely recommend ordering this.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine J. Sebena

customer_reviews.title: has more then one use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my grand daughter to use with her barbies. She loves 💘 it and all the girls get to hang out at the pool. Happy camper here.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Matteo

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! Much larger than expected. Hold drinks well. We put ice in the middle with extra drinks. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product, cup holders hold drinks securely. Really fun thing to have. A little tough to get fully inflated because plug is so tight but that may be a good thing! It’s do stable my kids put a bucket of popcorn in the middle last week!
customer_reviews.author: Floridagirl

customer_reviews.title: kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the grownups to use in the pool but the kids take it every time. The 5 year old loves to sit in it. The other kids but their drinks and chips in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen from Florida

customer_reviews.title: Functional and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: We love this rainbow float!! We use the cup holders for drinks and the “table” area to store phones, snacks, etc. It is so handy and Helpful. It is my favorite pool purchase this year.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Carter

customer_reviews.title: Love it! One of my favorite beach gadgets!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! Everyone in the beach asks where I got from. 😍 I use the middle part to put my snacks. Would not advice to use it as a cooler. Cup holders are practical. Super like the size, not too small or too big. Is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Emilio

customer_reviews.title: Item doesnt balance well on the surface of the pool or water
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this product didn't meet our expectation. Cup holders are very small, due to the design when placed in the pool or the surface, stuff spills over into the pool or water making it very unpractical. Sorry for the negative review, just stating the facts
customer_reviews.author: affiliateagle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my pool party!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loved it, and thought it was so cool. A fun idea if you have friends that like to swim and drink~ Only thing to be mindful on is sharp bottle caps. Make sure you put an empty cup in one of the holders for the caps.
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, expected a deeper cooler.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the middle part was more deep to really use as s floating cooler. But it is nice it works good until now (3 days of use).
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids too
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t opened it or inflated it yet. My apartment complex just sent a flier out saying no inflatables...😤
customer_reviews.author: BmwCPO

customer_reviews.title: Also great for small pets
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a pool raft with a solid bottom for my Shih-Poo puppy and he loves it. I actually use the drink cup holders for his water and treats. It works great for small dogs!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Owen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my party of 5 in DR
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my party of 5 in DR !!! I told everyone where I got it so I hope you get more business!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Cherrell

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute floatie! Got it for a recent trip. Holds drinks very well in the pool. Exactly s as described.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: rainbows and sunshine
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly cute and so sturdy! The cup holders hold 16 oz water bottle perfect. The middle part is perfect for ice, more drinks, and snacks. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, but definitely was defective. Wouldn’t stay fully inflated and lost all of the air 5 hours later.
customer_reviews.author: No'Elani

customer_reviews.title: works great especially on the pictures
customer_reviews.text: works great especially on the pictures, kids love it, my 10 yr old son and 4 yr old niece used it as a floaty it lasted the whole summer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price.
customer_reviews.text: Decent size and easy to inflate, did expect to be slightly deeper and to hold more items but overall good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect, holds my beverages doesn't tip or blow away. I have only had it for a few weeks and its still early in the season, but seems to beholding up well. Doesn't take up to much room in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works well perfect for hanging with friends middle holds ice for drinks or fill with ice and put dips on top
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Marcelino

customer_reviews.title: lots of outdoor fun
customer_reviews.text: only problem is this it is hard to close after it is blown up.
customer_reviews.author: ann montalbano

customer_reviews.title: Lost air. Defective.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. This item lost all air within 24 hours. The cup holders were also too small to hold my insulated tumbler. I’m trying to find information on how to return it and receive a credit.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Lane

customer_reviews.title: The middle isn't rigid, cupholders too little.
customer_reviews.text: Floppy in the center and the cupholders are not useful because they're too tight. I added cardboard to the center area to make a flat area and then it held a couple drinks in large plastic cups. It is very cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa M. Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Durable! 100% recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Big enough to have ice in it and drinks, but small enough to relax in the 12’ by 36” pool! Love it. And came with a little cute back for storage ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Looks great in the pool!
customer_reviews.text: Need a floating table? This is an excellent option! Fun, flexible, and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: K. GARRON

customer_reviews.title: Literally adorable, but my favorite part is the free cute ...
customer_reviews.text: Literally adorable, but my favorite part is the free cute backpack it came in. I love love love this. Get it.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie dignan

customer_reviews.title: Dog gives five stars!
customer_reviews.text: Love this float! I use it for my shihtzu to float in in the pool. I suppose it could be used as a cooler/cup holder too but it’s so much cuter with a puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Cool beverage holder
customer_reviews.text: Nicely holds your drinks while you're in a pool. Good space for other items you want to bring along.
customer_reviews.author: Will Someillan

customer_reviews.title: Better than a pool boy?
customer_reviews.text: Co-worker is lucky enough to have a pool, but not a pool boy. Now this keeps the wine chilled and close!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C Livingston

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Holds drinks and anything else you want to put in the middle of it very well, even when making some waves it doesn't tip over. Very sturdy when fully inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Exciting Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited about this but the seams didn’t hold up. It was a rubber chicken by the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: anna hamilton

customer_reviews.title: For pool use only, no tie off for open water.
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had a tie off so I could use it with a raft. besides that it's cute.
customer_reviews.author: Ktlynn

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my dog!
customer_reviews.text: I used this in the ocean and it works great for a dog. the drink holders are also sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: SO cute! Works great for us! We have been using it for drinks and no problems!
customer_reviews.author: MauiMermaid

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: So cute in the pool. Holds full drinks and empties. Dint have to get in and out of the pool all the time
customer_reviews.author: DDD

customer_reviews.title: Mold prone!
customer_reviews.text: Mold the day after using in pool. Covered in black mildew mold
customer_reviews.author: janjan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I initially wanted to get the individual floating drink holders. I went with this instead because I didn’t want so many single ones floating around the pool. Glad I made the right choice! This is very sturdy, looks great on the table as well as in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: K.Santos

customer_reviews.title: Useful float.
customer_reviews.text: Holds five drinks, friends can question my masculinity, and the dog fits in it. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dog because she loves to play in her pool. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Travis

customer_reviews.title: Cute but sub-par valve
customer_reviews.text: Great little accessory for the pool or river. Only thing I don’t like is that it loses air rapidly in the seconds between blowing it up and closing the valve so its almost impossible to keep it blown all the way up (just seems like a cheap valve). It did float though and looked cute while doing it!
customer_reviews.author: Vino

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Very fun, and received lots of compliments while using it! FYI, don't take it to the river, it's not really sturdy enough for the current, lol. Very cute for the pool, or even a table top ice cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item and seller are excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for. We have had a great time in our pool using this to keep our beverages cold. So convenient. We love it. And the service was excellent. Fast shipping. Everything was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Adds so much fun to our pool
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to be a fun and cute addition to our pool. And it is.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M.

customer_reviews.title: Hilariously functional!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this fun product! It really is sturdy and holds all the items n picture and floats around hilariously. V fun for Pride celebrations too
customer_reviews.author: Second City

customer_reviews.title: I use it a a doggie float
customer_reviews.text: I use it to bring my water-hating dog into the pool with us.. is great!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Garcia-Montes

customer_reviews.title: Looks like used...
customer_reviews.text: It looks like used not new. Also, item on one side is showing with a cut very badly made. It is cute, but the one that the company sent me is not properly made. Wish you luck.
customer_reviews.author: Jessika

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift
customer_reviews.text: I have no information on use of this item. But ordering and receiving was quick and easy. My friends that I gave it to love it. If they give me feedback, I would be happy to update.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Came With A Leak
customer_reviews.text: Cool product but when I blew it up after taking it out of the box it started to deflate, there is a small hole somewhere but will be tedious to try and find and repair. Got it in advance for a birthday gift a couple months ago and now I am not able to return/exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: I have not blown this up yet it is a June birthday present for my 5yr old to use as a pool float for her barbies but I'm excited for her to see this
customer_reviews.author: Christina lynn thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great pool party tool for when you don't want to get out of the pool to refresh your drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Rainbow surprise
customer_reviews.text: We brought this to wavespell and had a blast. We will definitely use this for other experiences. It was quick to inflate/ deflate and held up in the river where we were wading. It didn’t hold ice for long but I didn’t expect that in 90 weather.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great in the pool for drinks and to hold your phone.
customer_reviews.author: SJW79

customer_reviews.title: Cute.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Not really practical in a big pool. Would be great in a small pool or kiddie pool where it could be close by.
customer_reviews.author: Erin H.

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. I bought it to give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: PrincessGlitterPaws

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Easy to inflate. Holds ice very well does not leak into pool. Good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. He recently had a pool put in, and I got it for his birthday. Kids love it, too
customer_reviews.author: Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This is so study! Way better than I was expecting, totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha W

customer_reviews.title: Chihuahua pool float
customer_reviews.text: This is the best multipurpose pool product. I used it for our 2 chihuahuas to hang out on it and to hold our drinks. My chihuahuas weight 8lbs & 15lbs. This pool float held up great the entire summer. And for the price, it was so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Fab

customer_reviews.title: Drink holder and dog floaty
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dog. I have to put a towel so she doesn’t break it. But it works perfectly. She’s the cutest and this is the cutest!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim baughman

customer_reviews.title: Fun summer gift
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I purchased this gift for his mother for Mother's Day. She has a swimming pool and was preparing to open it for the summer so we did fun pool theme gift set with this and drink mixers. She loves it and can't wait to have a party to show it off!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Landis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent drink holder!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to inflate and nice to have around the pool!
customer_reviews.author: redMonkey5050

product_meta.title: Jasonwell Inflatable Rainbow Cloud Drink Holder Floating Beverage Salad Fruit Serving Bar Pool Float Party Accessories Summer Beach Leisure Cup Bottle Holder Water Fun Decorations Toys Kids Adults
feature_bullets: Big with 5 cup holders works with party cups, cans, and bottles. One built in snacks salad ice/Serving chest.
Vibrant Rainbow Printing + White cloud. Great addition for the pool, lakes, hot tub, parties etc.
Thick,soft and durable premium raft-grade non-phthalates material
New matt finish with Fast Valves, More than 5x faster inflation and deflation
Allows inflation with hairdryer on cold, toy air pump or compressor.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars964 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
